import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FinancialData(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[sortBy,setSortBy]=useState("revenue");const[order,setOrder]=useState("asc");// Filter states
const[filterBy,setFilterBy]=useState("");const[filterValueMin,setFilterValueMin]=useState("");const[filterValueMax,setFilterValueMax]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{let
